RelatedSentence: Azerbaijani Ministry of Emergency Situations has sent aid to Serbia where floods occurred .

A1: airplane loaded with aid leaved for Serbia
RelatedSentence: APA told that today the first airplane loaded with aid leaved for Serbia .
The employees of the Serbian Embassy in Azerbaijan also attended the seeing off ceremony .
Chief of the Emergency Ministry 's Materiel and Technical Support Department Amal Teymurov told journalists that the aid was sent under the task of President Ilham Aliyev .

A0: Chief of the Emergency Ministry 's Materiel and Technical Support Department Amal Teymurov
RelatedSentence: The aid consists of different equipment , motor boats of various sizes , 260 tents , blankets , power generators , water pumps and etc. , he said .
The airplane will land in Belgrade in the evening and the employees of the Emergency Ministry and Azerbaijani Embassy will hand over the aid to relevant authorities of Serbia .
